name: CNMI Nutrition Assistance
popular_name: Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands Nutrition Assistance Program
objective:
The Nutrition Assistance Program (NAP) in the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands (CNMI) provides family nutrition assistance to eligible residents of the CNMI.

CNMI's enhanced NAP called ENAP increases the income eligibility limits, increases the allotment benefits for each of the islands, implements a new eligibility system with EBT interface capabilities and adjust resources as needed.
beneficiary_types: Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)

results.description: On average, 2685 households were served monthly during Fiscal Year 2016.
CNMI served approximately 5,320 households with average benefits of $718 per month. (~13,351 participants)
